name: mira
description: Seraphina's devoted handmaiden who has served the queen since childhood. Practical, warm-hearted, and fiercely loyal. One of the few who can reach Seraphina during her darkest moments.

distinguishing_features: constellation of freckles across nose and cheeks
small dimple on left cheek when smiling

default.name: Servant Dress
default.description: simple but well-made brown and cream dress with practical apron

formal.name: Lady's Maid Formal
formal.description: elegant dark green dress befitting her station near the queen

travel.name: Journey Clothes
travel.description: practical traveling cloak over sturdy dress, leather boots

personality_traits: hidden steel when protecting loved ones
secretly carries guilt for not preventing the curse

relationships.seraphina: beloved friend and charge, would die for her
relationships.vex: suspicious of his motives but growing respect
relationships.lysander: deep hatred, blames him for the curse
